GSD.product_version: versions from v3.4 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
NFC: nci: Bounds check struct nfc_target arrays

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit f41547546db9af99da2c34e3368664d7a79cefae, it was introduced in version v3.4 by commit 019c4fbaa790e2b3f11dab0c8b7d9896d77db3e5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFC: nci: Bounds check struct nfc_target arrays
